Package xbird.xquery.func.time

Class Summary
AdjustTimezone
AdjustTimezone.AdjustDateTimeToTimezone Adjusts an xs:dateTime value to a specific timezone, or to no timezone at all.
AdjustTimezone.AdjustDateToTimezone fn:adjust-date-to-timezone.
